name: Changed: Light
description:
Synopsis

You are wake up in strange room. You can't remember anything like your name or where are you from. You can't say any word but your body is very light and flexible. Maybe outside of that room answers on your questions?

Credits

This fan-game by K0sm00s
Changed by DragonSnow
Soundtrack from Changed and made by ShiZi
Sounds from Basic SFX Library of RPG Maker

P.S. Options 'Credits' in main menu is loading button too. I forget to change that in current update :P
